requirements.summary: Remove the 'Play Banana Split Now!' button from the HomePage component
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Play Banana Split Now!' button is completely removed from the HomePage
No visual remnants or placeholder elements remain where the button was located
The page layout adjusts naturally without the button

file_operations.description: Remove the 'Play Banana Split Now!' button element and any associated container divs or wrapper elements. Ensure the surrounding layout elements adjust naturally without leaving gaps or placeholder remnants. Review the component structure to identify and delete the button JSX and any related styling or spacing elements that were specifically for the button.
